text: Mundawar is a village in the tehsil/mandal of Mundawar in the Alwar district of Rajasthan. Mundawar is one of the Town in Mundawar Mandal in Alwar District in Rajasthan State. Mundawar is 40 km far from its District Headquarter Alwar. It is 140  km far from its State Capital Jaipur. Mundawar's MLA is Dharmpal Choudhary.

Nellikunnu, Malayalam: നെല്ലിക്കുന്ന്, is land 2 km away from the Kasaragod town. Nellikunnu lingual means the mountain of nellika (a fruit). Many historical momunets including tomb of Thangal Uppapa and many shrines locate in this province.

Kotkasim (Hindi: कोट कासिम) is a small town in Alwar district of the Indian state of Rajasthan. It is also a tehsil. Kotkasim forms a part of the Ahirwal region in which members of the Yadav community dominate.
